newsitem.title: REPUBLIC OF IRELAND: Heiton Hldings acquires Sam Hire for 5.2 mln.
newsitem.headline: Heiton Hldings acquires Sam Hire for 5.2 mln.

text.p: Heiton Holdings Plc said on Thursday that it had acquired Sam Hire Holdings Ltd and Leeway Properties Ltd for 5.2 million Irish pounds.
Heiton said in a statement that the consideration will be met out of its own resources.
It said Sam Hire, a tool and plant hire business, has nine branches, three in Dublin and others in strategic locations around Ireland.

"The acquisition of Sam Hire is consistent with our strategy to acquire businesses which complement the group's core activities and enable us to expand our services to customers," Heitons group managing director, Richard Hewat said.
